desc: Avcor Health: Better Health Care Products compression medical products, compression bandages, SOLO amputation bandages, MACK Thermal, Cohesive and Elastic compression products. Amputation recovery care, SOLO Shrinker, SOLO Bandage, E-BAN, ICE-RIGHT, X-ECON, X-TOURN, IV ARM STABILIZERS, MEDICAL DEVICE SALES MEDICAL INN

layout.text: The SOLO amputation recovery line from Avcor Health is the first compression care created specifically for post-amputation surgery.  Patented roll-on design, now with silver and zinc.
